paragraphs.title: Hive Multiple Joins (Denormalized Table)
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disney_join1 STORED AS ORC AS
    SELECT 
        disney_bookings.*,
        disney_resorts.resort,
        disney_states.state,
        datediff(to_date(disney_bookings.arrival_date), to_date(disney_bookings.booking_date)) as days_until_arrival
    FROM disney_bookings
        JOIN disney_resorts ON (disney_bookings.resort_id = disney_resorts.resort_id) 
        JOIN disney_states ON (disney_states.state_id = disney_bookings.state_id)

paragraphs.title: Additional Hive Joins
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

-- Stream Join: Right-most table is streamed by default. Assuming disney_bookings is large. This buffers the values of disney_bookings while streaming the other tables.
--CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disney_join1 STORED AS ORC AS
--    SELECT /*+ STREAMTABLE(disney_bookings) */ 
--        disney_bookings.*, 
--        disney_resorts.resort, 
--        disney_states.state, 
--        datediff(to_date(disney_bookings.arrival_date), to_date(disney_bookings.booking_date)) as days_until_arrival
--    FROM disney_bookings
--        JOIN disney_resorts ON (disney_bookings.resort_id = disney_resorts.resort_id) 
--        JOIN disney_states ON (disney_states.state_id = disney_bookings.state_id)


-- MapJoin: Assuming disney_resorts and disney_states are small enough to fit into memory.
--CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disney_join1b STORED AS ORC AS
--    SELECT /*+ MAPJOIN(disney_resorts, disney_states) */ 
--        disney_bookings.*, 
--        disney_resorts.resort, 
--        disney_states.state,
--        datediff(to_date(disney_bookings.arrival_date), to_date(disney_bookings.booking_date)) as days_until_arrival
--    FROM disney_bookings
--        JOIN disney_resorts ON (disney_bookings.resort_id = disney_resorts.resort_id) 
--        JOIN disney_states ON (disney_states.state_id = disney_bookings.state_id)

paragraphs.title: Hive Query - How many days until a customer arrives at a propery (after they book)?
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

select resort, 
    avg(days_until_arrival) as avg_days_until_arrival,
    avg(rate) as avg_rate,
    avg(children) as avg_children,
    count(*) as count
    from disney_join1
    group by resort
    order by avg_days_until_arrival desc

paragraphs.title: Load 3 Hive Tables into Spark
paragraphs.text:
%spark2.pyspark

disney_bookings = spark.sql('select * from disney_bookings')
disney_resorts  = spark.sql('select * from disney_resorts')
disney_states   = spark.sql('select * from disney_states')

paragraphs.title: Spark Multiple Joins (Denormalized Table)
paragraphs.text:
%spark2.pyspark

disney_join1 = spark.sql('''
    SELECT 
        disney_bookings.*, 
        disney_resorts.resort, 
        disney_states.state,
        datediff(to_date(disney_bookings.arrival_date), to_date(disney_bookings.booking_date)) as booking_leadtime
    FROM disney_bookings 
        JOIN disney_resorts ON (disney_bookings.resort_id = disney_resorts.resort_id) 
        JOIN disney_states ON (disney_states.state_id = disney_bookings.state_id)
    ''')

disney_join1.createOrReplaceTempView('disney_join1_temp')

disney_join1.show(10,False)
